programme.title: FIA F4 Race - FIA - MAC Macau GP 2025
programme.desc: Guia Circuit packs a full FIA program—F4, Formula Regional, and GT World Cup—across Qualifying and Race sessions. Grid spots are set on a narrow 6.2 km street course before sprint-style showdowns where slipstreaming and precision through Lisboa and the Melco hairpin prove decisive. Expect factory-backed GT stars, emerging single-seater talent, safety-car-punctuated drama, and classic Macau stakes with walls inches away.

programme.title: FIFA World Cup 2026 - PlayOff Tournament and European Play Off Draws
programme.desc: FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and European Play-Off DrawsThe final pathways to the game-changing FIFA World Cup 2026™ will be mapped out when the draw for the FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and the European Play-Off draw takes place at the Home of FIFA in Zurich, Switzerland.The draws will define the routes the 22 competing nations – six via the Play-Off Tournament and 16 through European Play-Off matches – will need to successfully navigate to seal a spot at the first-ever 48-team FIFA World Cup™, which will be staged in Canada, Mexico and the United States from Thursday, 11 June to Sunday, 19 July 2026.

programme.desc: The draw for the FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament, along with the European Play-Off draw, is scheduled to occur at the Home of FIFA in Zurich, Switzerland, on Thursday, 20 November 2025. These draws will determine the routes for the 22 participating nations—six through the Play-Off Tournament and 16 via European Play-Off matches—who must successfully navigate these challenges to secure a place in the inaugural 48-team FIFA World Cup™.

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.title: Austria vs England - FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World CupThe 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.title: Uganda vs Burkina Faso - FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World CupThe 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.title: Al Shamal vs Al Wakrah - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W7
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Istres vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Morocco .. Champion of World Cup U20
programme.desc: Morocco capped off a historic run in Chile on October 2025, beating Argentina 2-0 to take home the trophy at the Under-20 World Cup. The result marked a first World Cup win for Morocco at any age-group level in the countrys history. Watch best moments of this achievement exclusive on beIN SPORTS.

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope.
